features: 【Loft Bed with Desk and Stairs】 The space-saving loft system combines a full bed, a large desk, four stair shelves and a compact wardrobe in one piece of furniture. The sleek and space-saving design adds a touch of elegance to any bedroom. Ideal for any residential setting such as children's bedrooms, colleges, and dorms.

【Storage Wardrobe and Staircase】 The wardrobe comes with hangers, and the built-in stairs can be used as both a staircase and a storage space for you to store your daily necessities. And storage stairs can be installed left and right.
【Sturdy Metal Frame】 Strong metal frame that includes an integrated ladder, full-length guardrails and secured metal slats to ensure security and stability.

[Multifunctional Design】 Loft bed with a staircase must be a benefit for you to put something in, this full loft bed is built with one comfortable sleeping space, one built-in desk and one small Wardrobe.

【Storage Wardrobe and Staircase】 The wardrobe comes with its own clothes rack, and the built-in staircase can be used as both a staircase and a storage space for you to store daily necessities.And storage stairs can be installed left and right.
body.description: Full Size Metal Loft Bed with Desk, Storage Staircase and Small Wardrobe, Storage stairs can be instIf your bedroom is in dire need of a versatile bed right now, then our metal loft bed is the perfect choice for you. The full-size upper bed provides plenty of room to sleep and unwind. The design of the built-in desk under the bed is good for saving space and facilitating your work and study. If your room lacks storage furniture, then buying this loft easily solves this problem, because its staircase is equipped with storage functions. This versatile loft can also be used for hanging clothes. At the bottom of the staircase, there is a small built-in wardrobe that can be used to store frequently worn clothes, which is very convenient. The sturdy metal material and simple black color design make this bed very eye-catching in the bedroom.DescriptionMaterialMetal+MDFSizeFullColorBlacknumbers of package2Spring boxNo needAssembly RequiredYesOriginVietnamDimensionsOverall Product Dimension94.3''L*56.5''W*70''HLoft Bed Dimension76.6'' x 54.1''Total height70''Number of Slats20pcsOverall Product Weight190lbBed weight capability350lbRecommend Bed Mattress Thickness6''

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice bunk beds!
reviews.reviewText: So far so good. Really love the stairs over the steps, they feel safer. And since the bottom bunk is for my 1yo love that it's low profile. You can see we opted not to do the slide....my son would never sleep! It wasn't difficult to put together if you follow the directions and take your time. and it feels nice and sturdy! I will say though look at the picture before you assemble because the description says the stairs and slide can be put on either side, but that's not true. The stairs will only fit on the left and we found that out the hard way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This either needed an octopus or 3 people to put it together. But once together. It is stunning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy and easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars so far so good!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Bed For What We Were Looking For
reviews.reviewText: We got this bed because it had the parent/guardian spot. My son is autistic and can take up to two hours to get him asleep at night. It is nice to have a spot designated that I am not awkwardly laying or sitting on his bed, then disturb him trying to get up after he is asleep. Another review stated sharp edges, the only edge that is sharp of any concern is the corner railing between the bed and the parent spot. We just put a corner protector on it. The parent seat is squeaky with any movement, I think because there are no legs in the middle, and the cushion is like a cardboard with a bit of fabric over it. Read directions carefully and watch how you are putting it together. Definitely a two person assembly. The yellow sticker says it has to stay on for safety reasons. I wish it was in a better spot, hidden from a curious toddler. We might just remove it because it is starting to peel already. We have been using it for a week now. It is serving us for our current needs and our son is loving it. The parent spot even makes for a great reading spot for our son. He loves to sit there and read his books. It is quirky, but it is a great bed for what we were looking for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not purchase
reviews.reviewText: This bed was extremely difficult to install. First the bolts provided to install this bed have an allen head has a bottom that is too shallow and the bottom is not flat so when you insert the allen wrench it doesn’t fit properly and you cant turn it to tighten it properly. Also the threaded inserts on the rails dont even match the bolt threads so when you try to tighten them the threads get damaged on both the bolts and threads on the rails. I had a really hard te turning the bolts because of this. I ended up breaking a bolt. You can imagine how difficult time it gave me to remove. Also the holes in the pols dont even go straight so when you insert a bolt through the pole it’s completely misaligned. I also ended up stripping the allen heads which made three bolts not able to be removed. The overall feeling I got from this bed is it is of inferior quality. I also did not like how tiny and slim the bolts were that I fear the bed might break and fall on top of my kid and severely injure him. The welds for the front railing are also pretty thin that I believe the railing will come loose over time. I know this bed is for kids but I think they could have used thicker railing and wider cross beams to hold the listed weight limit. I can see the cross beams for the top bed bending more than half and inch with weight on top. If I knew this bed would be so bad would not have purchased . Now I cant return it because I cant remove the allen bolts that got stripped which will make it impossible to remove.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We like this bed, but we don't love it. It's for our 6 year old and regret it because she hits her head on the metal bars when she's sitting in the nook area, or when she is playing with friends I'm worried they will fall on the corner and split their head open, I've attached foam edging to help. It also squeaks so badly from every move. Overall it's not bad for the price, but I wouldn't recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely love it!
reviews.reviewText: My 7 yr old and her husky love this bed! They can have sleepovers every night and have their own spaces. Not super difficult to assemble, but you’ll definitely want at least 3 people for set up.
